rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with natural light and ventilation, following Vastu principles by placing in the east for auspicious entry.
Large living area with multiple windows on both sides to maximize daylight and cross ventilation, positioned as per Vastu guidelines for family gatherings.
Adjacent to the living area with natural light; designed for a cozy dining setup.
Compact yet efficient kitchen with south-east facing windows, ensuring ample sunlight and ventilation.
Well-ventilated bathroom placed in the northeast to maintain hygiene according to Vastu norms.

openings.description: Large windows integrated for optimal natural light and ventilation
Multiple doors to ensure easy flow between rooms and spaces.

rooms.description: Large master bedroom with a balcony for morning sunlight and natural ventilation, following Vastu norms by positioning in the north-west.
Additional bedrooms designed to provide ample space while maintaining privacy and natural light through east-facing windows.
Balcony integrated for additional daylight, positioned as per Vastu guidelines.
Cozy bedroom with west-facing windows to capture the evening sun, aligned with natural energy flow.

openings.description: Windows designed for cross ventilation and optimal sunlight.
Two balconies providing access to outdoor space, promoting eco-friendly design.

rooms.description: Separate bedroom for servants ensuring privacy and adherence to local building norms.
Compact kitchenette for servant's quarters with energy-efficient fixtures.

openings.description: Optimized for natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy.

rooms.description: Multi-purpose storage area, designed for flexible use and energy efficiency.
